Android is an open platform that is freely available to you as an app developer. You can immediately download the Android SDK, develop apps, and distribute them to the world without any registration or fees. Android is developed by Google LLC and the Open Handset Alliance. We have made it available to you as a development platform pursuant to our commitment to openness, freedom, and innovation in mobile.
